title: Uptrends API v4
description:
This document describes Uptrends API version 4. This Swagger environment also lets you execute API methods directly.

Please note that this is not a sandbox environment: these API methods operate directly on your actual Uptrends account.

For more information, please visit https://www.uptrends.com/api.

auth_username.label: Username (user-basicauth)
auth_username.note: Authentication with user account (for API account registration only)

auth_password.label: Password (user-basicauth)
auth_password.note: Authentication with user account (for API account registration only)

CheckpointServer_GetAllServerIpv4s.title: Anonymous call, returns all the IPv4 addresses of all the checkpoint servers.

CheckpointServer_GetAllServerIpv6s.title: Anonymous call, returns all the IPv6 addresses of all the checkpoint servers.

MonitorGroup_GetMonitorGroup.title: Gets the details of a monitor group

MonitorGroup_UpdateMonitorGroup.title: Updates the monitor group with the Guid specified

MonitorGroup_GetMonitorGroupMembers.title: Gets a list of all members of a monitor group

MonitorGroup_AddMaintenancePeriodToAllMe.title: Adds the provided maintenance period to all monitors in the group specified

MonitorGroup_AddMonitorToMonitorGroup.title: Adds the specified monitor to the monitor group

MonitorGroup_RemoveMonitorFromMonitorGro.title: Removes the specified monitor from the monitor group

MonitorGroup_StopAllMonitorsInGroup.title: Stops all monitors that are a member of the monitor group specified by the monitor group GUID

MonitorGroup_StartAllMonitorsInGroup.title: Starts all monitors that are a member of the monitor group specified by the monitor group GUID

MonitorGroup_StopAllMonitorAlertsInGroup.title: Stops alerting for all monitors that are a member of the monitor group specified by the monitor group GUID

MonitorGroup_StartAllMonitorAlertsInGrou.title: Starts alerting for all monitors that are a member of the monitor group specified by the monitor group GUID

Operator_GetAllOperators.title: Gets a list of all operators.

Operator_GetOperator.title: Gets the details of the operator with the provided OperatorGuid.

Operator_GetOperatorGroupsForOperator.title: Gets a list of all operator groups of which the operator with the provided OperatorGuid is a member

Operator_GetDutyScheduleForOperator.title: Gets the duty schedule for an existing operator.

Operator_AddDutyPeriodForOperator.title: Adds a duty schedule for an existing operator.

Operator_UpdateDutyPeriodForOperator.title: Updates the specified duty period from the specified Operator

Operator_DeleteDutyScheduleFromOperator.title: Deletes the specified duty period from the specified Operator

Miscellaneous_GetTimezoneById.title: Gets the timezone with the specified Id.

Miscellaneous_GetAllOutgoingPhoneNumbers.title: Gets a list of all outgoing phone numbers available.

OperatorGroup_GetOperatorGroup.title: Gets the details of a operator group

OperatorGroup_UpdateoperatorGroup.title: Updates the operator group with the Guid specified

OperatorGroup_GetoperatorGroupMembers.title: Gets a list of all members of a operator group

OperatorGroup_AddDutyScheduleToAllMember.title: Adds the provided duty schedule to all operators in the group specified

OperatorGroup_AddOperatorToOperatorGroup.title: Adds the specified operator to the operator group

OperatorGroup_RemoveoperatorFromoperator.title: Removes the specified operator from the operator group

MonitorCheck_GetMonitorCheck.title: Returns monitor check data for a specific monitor.

MonitorCheck_GetMonitorGroupData.title: Returns monitor check data for a specific monitor group.

MonitorCheck_GetHttpDetails.title: Returns HTTP details for a monitor check.

MonitorCheck_GetMultistepDetails.title: Returns Multi-Step API details for a monitor check.

MonitorCheck_GetTransactionDetails.title: Returns transaction step details for a monitor check.

MonitorCheck_GetWaterfallInfo.title: Returns waterfall information for a monitor check.

Monitor_GetMonitor.title: Returns the definition of the specified monitor.

Monitor_PutMonitor.title: Updates the definition of the specified monitor.
Monitor_PutMonitor.description: This methods only accepts a complete monitor definition. We recommend retrieving the existing definition first (using the GET method). You can then process the changes you want to make and send back the updated definition using this PUT method.

Monitor_CloneMonitor.title: Creates a clone (duplicate) of the specified monitor.
Monitor_CloneMonitor.description: Upon creation, the new monitor will be inactive. This allows you to make the necessary changes before you activate it. All other settings will be transferred to the new monitor as-is.

Monitor_GetAllMaintenancePeriodsForMonit.title: Finds all maintenance periods for a monitor.

Monitor_CreateMaintenancePeriodForMonito.title: Saves the new maintenance period provided for the specified monitor

Monitor_DeleteMaintenancePeriodFromMonit.title: Deletes the specified maintenance period from the specified monitor

Monitor_UpdateMaintenancePeriodForMonito.title: Updates the specified maintenance schedule for the specified monitor

Monitor_CleanupMaintenancePeriods.title: Clears out all one-time maintenance periods for the specified monitor older than the specified date

Register_Post.title: Creates a new API account.
Register_Post.description: This method requires that you specify the username and password of an Uptrends operator login as authentication. When registration is successful, please save the UserName and Password fields from the response: these are your new API credentials.

Vault_CreateNewVaultItem.title: Creates a new vault item.
Vault_CreateNewVaultItem.description: The VaultItemGuid field should be omitted

Vault_UpdateVaultItem.title: Updates the specified vault item.
Vault_UpdateVaultItem.description: Only complete definitions are accepted. Fields not specified will be NULLed.

Vault_CreateNewVaultSection.title: Creates a new vault section.
Vault_CreateNewVaultSection.description: When a new vault section is created, the user that created the section is granted View and Edit authorizations to that section. The VaultSectionGuid attribute should be omitted in the request body. The Guid of the newly created section will be returned in the response.

Vault_GetAuthorizationsForVaultSection.title: Returns all authorizations for the specified vault section.

Vault_CreateAuthorizationForVaultSection.title: Creates a new authorization for the specified vault section.
Vault_CreateAuthorizationForVaultSection.description: The AuthorizationId attribute should be omitted in the request body. The AuthorizationId of the newly created authorization will be returned in the response. In the ContextID attribute, fill in the VaultSectionGuid that identifies the vault section for which to create the new authorization. Valid values for the AuthorizationType field are "ViewVaultSection" and "ChangeVaultSection". An authorization should be granted to either an individual operator, or an operator group. Therefore, either specify the OperatorGuid attribute or the OperatorGroupGuid attribute.

Vault_DeleteAuthorizationForVaultSection.title: Deletes the specified authorization for the specified vault section.
